personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.about: I‚Äôm a versatile full‚Äëstack Software Engineer based in Bengaluru with over two years of hands‚Äëon experience building scalable, user‚Äëcentered web applications. At Celstream Technologies, I‚Äôve led the development of high‚Äëtraffic React/Node.js solutions on AWS‚Äîdelivering performance‚Äëcritical features that cut load times by 25%, architecting real‚Äëtime dashboards that improved page speed by 50%, and mentoring junior developers to ship production‚Äëready code in record time. During my internship at Neonflake, I designed and implemented a secure, full‚Äëfeatured e‚Äëcommerce platform from Figma wireframes, leveraging Redis caching for a 95%+ API speedup and crafting a fully responsive UI that boosted user engagement by 35%. Outside of work, I‚Äôve built ‚ÄúQR‚ÄØDine,‚Äù a Next.js and Stripe‚Äìpowered restaurant SaaS, and an Expense Tracker using the MERN stack and Redux to help users manage finances intuitively. I‚Äôm comfortable across modern web ecosystems (React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Python/Flask) and backed by Udemy‚Äôs ‚ÄúReact‚ÄØ‚Äì‚ÄØThe Complete Guide‚Äù and Lyft‚Äôs backend virtual experience certification. Whether optimizing CDNs and code‚Äësplitting for lightning‚Äëfast experiences or architecting microservices with JWT‚Äësecure APIs and in‚Äëmemory data handling, I‚Äôm passionate about bridging technical excellence with elegant, user‚Äëfocused design.

experience.description: Lead development of scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS. Mentored junior developers and improved team productivity by 40%.
achievements: Implemented interactive diagramming features using GoJS in a React-based system, building 50K+ custom node/link templates with drag-and-drop, zoom/pan, and real-time updates, improving user task efficiency by 40%.
Integrated RESTful APIs with advanced error state handling and retry mechanisms.
Mentored 2 interns, accelerating onboarding and enabling them to ship production-ready code within 2 weeks.
Architected and led a performance-critical feature for a high-traffic application, achieving 25% faster load times and zero post-deployment rollbacks.
Designed a real-time visualization dashboard using advanced optimization techniques like code-splitting, lazy loading, and CDN caching, improving page load speeds by 50%.
Developed Flask-based backend services with in-memory data handling mimicking Redis behavior, reducing API response times by 90%.

experience.description: Contributed as a Full Stack Developer intern to build a complete e-commerce web application from scratch based on Figma designs. Focused on delivering responsive frontend and high-performance backend architecture with secure authentication.
achievements: Designed and developed a fully functional e-commerce platform from Figma designs using React.js and TypeScript
Built secure and scalable backend APIs using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and JWT-based authentication
Implemented Redis caching with eviction policy to support stateful backend, improving API response time by 95%+
Delivered a fully responsive frontend interface across desktop and mobile devices
Improved user engagement by 35% through intuitive design and performance optimizations
Integrated modern UI/UX design systems to align with current web standards

projects.title: Q R Dine
projects.description: QR Dine is a SaaS-based platform that revolutionizes the restaurant dining experience by allowing customers to scan a unique QR code placed on each table to view the menu, place orders, and interact with the restaurant directly from their mobile devices. Restaurant owners can manage multiple branches, tables, menus, and categories through the admin portal, while customers can seamlessly place orders via the client portal.

projects.title: Expense Tracker App
projects.description: Expense Tracker App a financial management application utilizing the MERN stack and Redux. This app empowers users to effortlessly manage their finances, understand spending patterns, and make informed financial decisions.

projects.title: Skill packers
projects.description: Developed and deployed a static website for Skill Packers, a Bengaluru-based manufacturing company specializing in wooden pallets and packaging solutions. Designed a responsive and user-friendly interface to enhance the company‚Äôs online presence.
